text: 28:23 2 Eghaghaniba 25:14; Jeremaia 44:17-18A kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Siriaba faragha mɨdorozimɨn na abɨra. Sirian atrivibar aseba ti Siriabar akura. Eghtɨ kɨ da bagh ofa damutɨ, da ti uaghan nan akuragham.” Egha Ahas Sirian asebar ofa gami. An arazir kabagh amima, bizir kam bangɨn osɨmtɨzir ekiaba, a ko Israelian gumazamiziba batifi.
